headline: Sands China Collaborates With the Macao Government To Revitalize Iconic Landmarks
summary: NORTHAMPTON, MA / ACCESSWIRE / December 19, 2024 / Las Vegas Sands Published by Las Vegas Sands on December 12, 2024 In collaboration with the Macao SAR government, Sands China launched its Community Revitalization Program in 2023 to support local ...
